column9: Information

  - columns: groupName, memberCount, leaderName, leaderPhone, leaderEmail

  - row action (optional): Edit -> UpdateGroupPage (context: FARM)

[Input Form]

• Leader selection (required)
  - leader search input
  - search result list (name, phone, role)
[Actions]
• Cancel button
• Create button (loading / disabled state)
[Validation Messages]
• groupName required / duplicate name (if applicable)
• leader not selected

  - groupName
  - type
  - leaderName / leaderPhone

  - columns: cellName, leaderName, leaderPhone, leaderEmail
  - row click (disabled in MVP if no detail page yet)
